api_endpoints.name: Create a new paste
api_endpoints.short_description: Endpoint to create a new anonymous or authorized paste

value: Unix timestamp at which the paste should expire; defaults to no expiry if no value is supplied
Paste title; defaults to Untitled if no value is supplied
Language of the paste; defaults to plain text if no value is supplied
Optionally add a password to restrict access to the paste; defaults to no password if no value is supplied

response_parameters.value: Unix timestamp at which the paste was posted
The number of views the paste has; initialized to 0
This field will always be true for a new paste.
The paste ID, represented as either a decrypted or encrypted ID (this is configured by the server administrator)
